sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"舒适，安逸，悠闲"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: comfort, ease, leisure, relaxation, relief, rest
means: comfort ： 通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情，或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
ease ： 指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
leisure ： 专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。
relaxation ： 强调消除肌肉疲劳或思想的紧张状态，使身心松弛，得到休息。
relief ： 侧重有消除痛苦、不适或困难的负担，常暗含不利因素已不存在的意味。
rest与work相对，强调水分除身心痛劳，不着重休息方式。

word_mean: 减轻：缓和或解除疼痛或痛苦
浮雕：雕塑底面上形成的突起
缓解：减少或消除义齿基托下方特殊区域的不适压力，另见chamber和space项下

sentence.Network_en: She became involved in social and relief work among the refugees.
sentence.Network_cn: 她参加了帮助难民的社会救济工作。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from relever 'raise up, relieve', from Latin relevare 'raise again, alleviate'

encyclopedia.content: relief 名词 n. 1. 锛埻纯啵旱５鹊娘級缓和，减轻；解除[U][S1][(+of/from/on)] The pills gave her some relief. 药片减轻她一些痛苦。 2. 轻松，宽心，慰藉[U][S1] Hearing the news, he breathed a sigh of relief. 一听到消息，他如释重负地松了口气。 3. 救济；补助；解救[U] 4. 救济物品，救济金[U] Relief was flown to the flood-hit areas. 救济物品被空运到洪水泛滥区。 5. 锛埗缘サ骰蚪粽诺娘級调剂；消遣[U][S1] 6.

entry.def: If you feel a sense of relief, you feel happy because something unpleasant has not happened or is no longer happening.

example.ex: I breathed a sigh of relief...
example.tran: 我如释重负地松了口气。

example.ex: The news will come as a great relief to the French authorities...
example.tran: 这个消息会让法国当局大大松一口气。

entry.tran: (疼痛或苦痛的)解除，免除，减轻，缓解
entry.def: If something provides relief from pain or distress, it stops the pain or distress.

example.ex: This brought considerable relief from the pain.
example.tran: 这相当大地缓解了疼痛。

example.ex: ...a self-help programme which can give lasting relief from the torment of hay fever.
example.tran: 可以持续缓解枯草热病痛的自助项目

entry.def: Relief is money, food, or clothing that is provided for people who are very poor, or who have been affected by war or a natural disaster.

example.ex: Relief agencies are stepping up efforts to provide food, shelter and agricultural equipment.
example.tran: 救济机构正加大力度提供食物、住所和农用器械。

entry.def: A relief worker is someone who does your work when you go home, or who is employed to do it instead of you when you are sick.
A relief is a sculpture that is carved out of a flat vertical surface.

means.word_mean: 1. the feeling that comes when something burdensome is removed or reduced;

sentences.sentence: "as he heard the news he was suddenly flooded with relief"

means.word_mean: 2. the condition of being comfortable or relieved (especially after being relieved of distress);

sentences.sentence: "getting it off his conscience gave him some ease"
"was the relief supposed to be protection from future harm or compensation for past injury?"

means.word_mean: 4. someone who takes the place of another (as when things get dangerous or difficult);

sentences.sentence: "the star had a stand-in for dangerous scenes"
"we need extra employees for summer fill-ins"
"the contributions provided some relief for the victims"
"people actually accomplish more when they take time for short rests"

means.word_mean: 8. aid for the aged or indigent or handicapped;

sentences.sentence: "he has been on relief for many years"

means.word_mean: 9. the act of reducing something unpleasant (as pain or annoyance);

sentences.sentence: "he asked the nurse for relief from the constant pain"

means.word_mean: 10. sculpture consisting of shapes carved on a surface so as to stand out from the surrounding background
11. the act of freeing a city or town that has been besieged;

sentences.sentence: "he asked for troops for the relief of Atlanta"

auth_sentence.content: Relief wells doesn't mean the leak will stop.
auth_sentence.res_content: Relief wells doesn't mean the leak will stop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Relief wells doesn't mean the leak will stop.

auth_sentence.content: But some of these homeowners might soon get relief.
auth_sentence.res_content: But some of these homeowners might soon get relief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But some of these homeowners might soon get relief.

auth_sentence.content: Crisis maps also helped with relief efforts in Haiti.
auth_sentence.res_content: Crisis maps also helped with relief efforts in Haiti.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Crisis maps also helped with relief efforts in Haiti.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 减轻,解除,援救,救济,换班

means.word_mean: (痛苦等)缓解, 减轻, 解除

sentences.en: This medicine will give you some relief.
sentences.cn: 这药会为你减轻一些痛苦。

sentences.en: A doctor's task is to work for the relief of patient's suffering.
sentences.cn: 医生的工作是解除病人的痛苦。

sentences.en: They send relief to those who made homeless by floods.
sentences.cn: 他们给水灾中无家可归的人发送救援物资。

means.word_mean: 轻松, 宽慰, （不快过后的）宽慰, 轻松, 解脱

sentences.en: His words provided some comic relief in what was really a dull speech.
sentences.cn: 他的话给极沉闷的讲话增添了几分轻松的气氛。

means.word_mean: 换班[接替]人, 加班[增开]的公共汽车、火车等

sentences.en: The relief for the military guard is expected soon.
sentences.cn: 预计卫队很快就来换班。

sentences.en: They had to provide a relief bus because there were so many passengers.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不增加一辆公共汽车, 因为乘客很多。

jushi.english: They send relief to those who made homeless by floods.
jushi.chinese: 他们给水灾中无家可归的人发送救援物资。

jushi.english: They had to provide a relief bus because there were so many passengers.
jushi.chinese: 因为乘客很多,所以他们不得不加派一辆公共汽车。

jushi.english: This medicine will give you some relief.
jushi.chinese: 这药会减轻你一些痛苦。
